Unpopular Monster Rancher opinions
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: April 2013 Topics: Unpopular Monster Rancher opinions
By OgreBattle on Sunday, April 21, 2013 - 05:33 am:

Post anything here that you think is an unpopular opinion about the series. I'll give a few of my own examples:

-I like 4 better than 2
-I like 3 better than EVO
-I hate using speed-based monsters... for some reason it just seems like they never end up dodging and they just crumble
-Bajarls, Mocks and Apes are awesome (so controversial, I know)
-I didn't mind when worms got removed--I didn't like their animations, and all other breeds with worm sub breeds just would have been cooler with a Beaklon sub
-The Joker designs for 3, 4 and EVO far surpass how they appear in 2
-One of the monsters I most want to see in a console return is not Wracky, or Arrowhead...but Zilla
-When breeds have little/no subs, and there are no subs with that breed, I get a bit annoyed
-Durahans are the best looking breed in 2, 3 and 4
-Monster Rancher 3's region-based breed system allowed for more creative monster types to appear in breeds that wouldn't normally have that option (ice-beaklon) and was a worthy sacrifice for the type of game that it was

By OgreBattle on Sunday, April 21, 2013 - 01:55 pm:

-koropandoras are gross dont look at them

By fiffa46 on Thursday, April 25, 2013 - 06:20 pm:

Is liking 3 better then EVO even remotely unpopular?

By Lisa Shock on Friday, April 26, 2013 - 11:17 am:

3 sold more copies than Evo...

By OgreBattle on Friday, April 26, 2013 - 04:48 pm:

Yeah, but when I go on GameFAQs or whatever all I hear is immense amount of 3 hate. Probably the emphasis on cartoony-er monsters.

By AlmostUnsane on Saturday, April 27, 2013 - 05:49 am:

-They should've kept Undines and dropped Pixies.
-Ghosts are the best monster, period.
-Centaurs need a console comeback, preferably not
one where you have to beat everything before you can
use them...

I also prefer 4 to 2, but it's very close. If they
had the same monsters, it'd be a landslide win for
4.

By OgreBattle on Sunday, April 28, 2013 - 07:31 am:

I also believe that some monsters can get a lot more subtype 'action', such as Gaboos in MR2

By Thorr on Tuesday, April 30, 2013 - 01:44 pm:

I hate every console MR after the original. I hated MR2.

By OgreBattle on Tuesday, April 30, 2013 - 03:35 pm:

Unpopular indeed!

By Shen the Keeper on Wednesday, May 1, 2013 - 10:12 am:

I don't like worms or beaclons. Bugs and worms are yucky. :P
I'd like to see Undine (popular), Mock or Jill to return.

By Jennimason0990 on Thursday, May 2, 2013 - 09:23 am:

I really dislike the art for jokers since MR2. Joker was my favourite monster in Monster Rancher two, but in every game since they've taken on a more reaper-like aspect, and lost their demon clown look for the most part.

Also, I love to raise bad-natured monsters. Stuff like Suezos, Nagas, Jokers, Apes. I like monsters that are harder to raise and have a bad attitude or are just lazy.

By Kuwabara54 on Thursday, May 2, 2013 - 01:28 pm:

I love Gaboos. They are my favorite monsters. I can
seriously watch one walk around the ranch for ever
in MR2 and love when they pretend to shoot the sky
after they win. They have really good stat gains in
everything
except INT. Seems like there's always been so much
hate for these guys.

By OgreBattle on Thursday, May 2, 2013 - 05:39 pm:

Dude, I love Gaboos too! I always wish there were more subtypes, and that other monsters had Gaboo subtypes. a Golem/Gaboo would probably be my favorite monster ever.

By lileave on Tuesday, May 28, 2013 - 12:38 am:

I think Joker and Phoenix look poorly in every game

Plant is also one of my favorite monster types.
